title: Rapper Millyz Joins the Show
description:
Rapper Millyz joins the show to discuss his Boston Celtics. We just had to ask him about what it was like to be in the building for Game 7 vs the Bucks. We also talk to him about working with legends Snoop Dogg and Jadakiss in anticipation of his latest album set to be released. Also, Jalen & Jacoby breakdown tonight’s matchup between the Boston Celtics and the Miami Heat. There may be superstars ready to showcase their offensive talent, but it’s the defense that the guys have their eye on. Find out who has the edge for game 1. And Steph Curry a two-way player? Find out if the guys agree.
